Description:
Detects suspicious command line flags that let the user set a target user and command as e.g. seen in PsExec-like tools

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious RunAs-Like Flag Combination
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% -u system %' or command like '% --user system %' or command like '% -u nt%' or command like '% -u "nt%' or command like '% -u 'nt%' or command like '% --system %' or command like '% -u administrator %') and (command like '% -c cmd%' or command like '% -c "cmd%' or command like '% -c powershell%' or command like '% -c "powershell%' or command like '% --command cmd%' or command like '% --command powershell%' or command like '% -c whoami%' or command like '% -c wscript%' or command like '% -c cscript%'))
